items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks just like the photo!
items.body: Fit is perfect. I got lots of compliments on the style and color. Looks just like the photo. Fabric is lux and looks expensive. The dress is very well made, and not heavy at all and is comfortable to wear. Read more

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful but…
items.body: Beautiful dress but, right out the bag it had what appeared to be a lot of lint and animal hair on it. Not sure how that happened. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars BUY BUY BUY!
items.body: Gorgeous dress and fit perfectly! I received so many compliments on the dress color and material. I bought it in the “hunter green”. It was very comfortable. I would buy it again in a heartbeat! Read more
items.author: Ashley K

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: I was looking for a Christmas type dress to wear for family pictures! I am 6 months postpartum and have been struggling to get the weight off while breastfeeding so finding clothes that fit me and make me feel pretty has been very hard. But the second I put this on, I fell in love. It’s very flattering to lots of different shapes. And the pockets are a great bonus feature. The velvet is very soft. I love that the Mateo’s not this and cheap feeling, but it’s also not heavy to wear I’ll sweat or get too hot. Read more
items.author: Misty L. Wilson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great holiday dress!
items.body: Very cute dress! Great quality and fit! Perfect for the holidays! Read more
items.author: Loretta

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute Dress
items.body: Accurate website description on the dress in regards to what it looks like. Runs a smaller so size up for more comfort. Dress is stretchy and lightweight. Read more
items.author: TJ

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: #Burnout-rust, #Burnout-dark Blue, #Burnout-black, #Burnout-coffee, #Burnout-green, Burgundy, Burnt Orange, Army Green, Black, Teal Blue, Dusty Blue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
